entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
